大道商人: (だいどうしょうにん) - street vendor; peddler; hawker
大道演説: (だいどうえんぜつ) - (yoji) street (soapbox) oratory; stump oratory
大道芸人: (だいどうげいにん) - street performer (comedian)
大道走: (オオミチバシリ) - greater roadrunner (Geococcyx californianus)
大違い: (おおちがい) - great difference; major mistake
大選挙区制: (だいせんきょくせい) - electoral system allowing for the election of multiple candidates from one district; multi-member constituent electoral system
大邦: (たいほう) - large country; great nation; major power; great power
大部: (だいぶ) - (ant: 小部) lengthy (of a book, etc.)/voluminous; most (e.g. most part)/greater/fairly/a good deal/much
大部分: (だいぶぶん) - (ant: 小部分) most part; greater part; majority
大部屋: (おおべや) - large room; actors' common-use room; hospital room or ward
大都市圏: (だいとしけん) - greater metropolitan area; megalopolis; conurbation
大野貝: (オオノガイ) - Mya arenaria oonogai (subspecies of soft-shell clam)
大量: (tairyou) - large quantity, massive (quantity), mass (por exemplo, produção em massa, transporte em massa, destruição em massa)
大量伝達: (たいりょうでんたつ) - mass communication
大量出血: (たいりょうしゅっけつ) - hemorrhaging
大量死: (たいりょうし) - large number of deaths; massive fatalities
大量殺人: (たいりょうさつじん) - mass killing; mass murder; bloodbath
大量殺人者: (たいりょうさつじんしゃ) - mass murderer
大量殺害: (たいりょうさつがい) - mass-killing; mass-murder; bloodbath
大量生産: (たいりょうせいさん) - mass production
大量発行: (たいりょうはっこう) - large-scale issue (e.g. of bonds); large circulation
大量破壊兵器: (たいりょうはかいへいき) - weapons of mass destruction; WMD
大量絶滅: (たいりょうぜつめつ) - extinction event; mass extinction
大量虐殺: (たいりょうぎゃくさつ) - massacre; genocide
大量退職: (たいりょうたいしょく) - mass retirement (esp. that of the Japanese baby boomers)
大金: (おおがね) - large amount of money; great cost
大金持: (おおかねもち) - very rich person
大金持ち: (おおかねもち) - very rich person
大金星: (だいきんぼし) - {sumo} most spectacular victory; win of rank-and-file wrestler over the truly great grand champion
大金鶏菊: (オオキンケイギク) - tickseed (Coreopsis lanceolata); tickweed; sand coreopsis; lanceleaf tickseed
大鈴: (おおすず) - large bell (at a shrine)
大鉈を振るう: (おおなたをふるう) - to make drastic cuts; to take an axe to
大銀杏: (おおいちょう) - large ginkgo tree; {sumo} ginkgo-leaf top-knot worn by makuuchi and juryo division wrestlers
大銀杏髷: (おおいちょうまげ) - {sumo}  ginkgo-leaf top-knot worn by makuuchi and juryo division wrestlers
大鋸: (おおが) - large saw; framed pit saw
大鍬形: (オオクワガタ) - giant stag beetle (Dorcus hopei)
大関: (おおぜき) - {sumo} wrestler of second highest rank
大関陥落: (おおぜきかんらく) - {sumo}  demotion from oozeki ranking
大閤: (たいこう) - (esp. refers to Toyotomi Hideyoshi)  taiko; title for a regent, later for the grand chancellor, also for the father of an Imperial adviser (advisor) who passed the role to his son
大阪しろ菜: (おおさかしろな) - bok choy hybrid (Brassica campestris var. amplexicaulis) (pak choi, bokchoy)
大阪の食い倒れ: (おおさかのくいだおれ) - financially ruining oneself by overindulging in food and drink (as a fabled tendency of the people of Osaka)
大阪事件: (おおさかじけん) - Osaka Incident; plot by Oi Kentaro and the Liberal Party to support a Korean uprising, 1885
大阪会議: (おおさかかいぎ) - Osaka Conference; meeting held by the leaders of the Meiji Restoration in Osaka to discuss the formation of a representative assembly (January-February, 1875)
大阪白菜: (おおさかしろな) - bok choy hybrid (Brassica campestris var. amplexicaulis) (pak choi, bokchoy)
大阪証券取引所: (おおさかしょうけんとりひきじょ) - Osaka Securities Exchange
大阪高裁: (おおさかこうさい) - Osaka High Court
大阪鮨: (おおさかずし) - Kansai-style sushi (esp. pressed sushi, such as battera)
大陰: (だいおん) - Daion; one of the eight gods of the koyomi
大陸: (tairiku) - continent; continental Asia (especialmente a China continental) , continent; continental Asia (esp. mainland China); continental Europe
大陸プレート: (たいりくプレート) - continental plate
大陸プレート境界: (たいりくプレートきょうかい) - continental plate boundary
大陸ヨーロッパ: (たいりくヨーロッパ) - continental Europe
大陸命: (たいりくめい) - (abbr. of 大本営陸軍部命令) imperial army order
大陸哲学: (たいりくてつがく) - continental philosophy
大陸国家: (たいりくこっか) - continental state (e.g. Australia)
大陸性気候: (たいりくせいきこう) - continental climate
大陸横断鉄道: (たいりくおうだんてつどう) - transcontinental railroad
大陸法: (たいりくほう) - civil law; continental law
大陸浪人: (たいりくろうにん) - (yoji) prewar Japanese adventurer (political activist) in mainland China
大陸狼: (たいりくおおかみ) - (European) gray wolf (carnivore, Canis lupus lupus); grey wolf
大陸的: (たいりくてき) - continental; calm/not worried with unimportant details
大陸移動説: (たいりくいどうせつ) - theory of continental drift
大陸間弾道ミサイル: (たいりくかんだんどうミサイル) - Intercontinental Ballistic Missile; ICBM
大陸鼯鼠: (タイリクモモンガ) - Siberian flying squirrel (Pteromys volans)
